summary: The document is a Rights Agreement dated November 17, 2025, between Oramed Pharmaceuticals Inc. and Continental Stock Transfer & Trust Company, outlining the terms for issuing common share purchase rights to shareholders. The agreement details the conditions under which these rights can be exercised, adjusted, or redeemed, and defines key terms such as "Acquiring Person" and "Beneficial Owner." It also specifies the roles and responsibilities of the Rights Agent and the procedures for handling the rights certificates.
